评论详情: This top is so pretty, lightweight & true to size & that deep green color from the picture! I'm not one to always give positive reviews but this top is great.  The fabric is cool and holds it shape well. I was so excited to wear it to my grandson's ballgame & received several compliments on it. Definitely would order it again & in another color for the fall.

It’s ok, I expected to love it and order in more colors but when I saw it in person it just come across more grandma-ish. The color is at least pretty. Also, recommend ordering a size up. Personally i won’t be ordering in any other colors.

Totally not what is pictured. The neckline is super high up. The sleeves do have cute little frills at the bottom. It made me look like an old lady going to church rather than cool and sexy. 🤣🤣🤣 My sister and I had a good laugh modeling it then promptly sent back. Buyer beware.

Ok so the reviews for this shirt are extremely varied, so I’m going to give as specific of a review as I can.  #1 I wear predominantly black shirts. It’s a lewk. However lately I have been feeling like I want to ditch the black and try bright colors. I ordered something in pink, another thing in a really nice tie dye combo, and then this bright ass yellow blouse. I’m happy to say that I really like the color life lol. Everything I got works. And that includes this item.  The reviews are concerning.some people said it was absolute garbage too big cheap not the same as the listing pictures, etc. The pictures by reviewers were reassuring, though. I figured I’d give it a shot. I am 5’2” 170 with a big D/DD chest. I ordered the XL in this shirt.  There is No question that it is not high end quality. The material is definitely cheap and not pleasing to the skin in any capacity. There isn’t even a tag in it. It also is definitely not whats in the photo but as a serious Amazon user I learned long ago that any company with a weird name and headless pictures means I’m only buying something *similar* to the photo. Like a “if you like this look, then you’ll like what we send you” kinda thing. I’ve accepted that. So I got this with uncertain, but realistic, expectations. It fits the look I was going for, so I’m relatively satisfied. At least with this one.  The fit Is perfect from top to hip, and then it gets boxy and long. It is like tunic length on me, although I am only 5’2”. See pics for reference. I also like tunics so I don’t know I could probably make it cute dressing it up a bit as a tunic. But generally I plan to wear it French tucked. I actually could hem it bc I have some hemming tape so who knows I might do that. But the sleeves are great, the color is awesome considering it is bright assssss yellow, and also considering I literally have 20 black shirt s in my closet and dresser. You’d think I’d run away from this but no I like it. Beware though Even with the lining under it it is still fairly see through. Must wear nude colored bra with this.  How will I wear this? For now probably with jeans and high sandals, or dress pants and flats. I want very badly to wear it with leggings but all my leggings are, you guessed it, black and bc I got yellow I think I’ll look like a bumble bee. But maybe not though. Not sure yet.  Either way I am definitely keeping this AND looking at other colors. I hope whatever other one I order Is just like this one and not all effed up. It’s worth ordering and seeing if you like it.  Update: worn this a few times and I did wear it as a tunic w leggings and flat sandals. Got a lot of compliments on the color and just cute shirt in general. I also went and bought a long sleeved navy blue option and it is just as awesome.
Fit perfectly and looked great.  Just what I had hoped it would be.  It's hard to tell from a picture, but it was well made and true to size.
It fits so awkwardly. The sleeves are too tight but then there’s extra fabric by the shoulders. The front isn’t as plunging as the photo, and it’s cut weird around the center.
Super cute shirt but made oddly. Plenty of room in the stomach and chest area and tight in the shoulders and arms.

评论概述: No give but love the color
评论详情: There’s no stretch to this blouse it’s a crochet type blouse with a satin cami shell on inside. It kind of looks like something our grandmothers wore in the 60’s to play bridge. But if your not large chested (I’m a DD) it will be super cute top for jeans, shorts. But it’s just blah for us bigger chested girls & my husband says I look like his grandmother in it but I love the designs & color. Lol

Amazon warned me that this was a highly returned item and I ignored it... If you have a large bust and a short waist, this is not the shirt for you. It is cut very straight, and it was way too long on me. The check is much higher than in the picture. So there is no hint of the decolletage. Plus the bottom of the gem is stiff, so tucking it in like in the picture is not an option either, as it sits funny because the lace is very stiff. The blouse itself was a pretty color, but there is a faint pinstripe that I did not see on the picture that I was not a fan of. The sleeves are a good width, but not elasticized as it looks in the picture. Overall I think the top is pretty if long and straight works for you.

For an inexpensive white blouse, this is a winner. It's well made, flattering, and true to size. The front of the blouse is lined so, while it's sheer, you can't see through the front. I'll wear a flesh-colored bra and should be fine. The fit is just what other reviewers have said: it's a fairly generous cut so choose your size based on how fitted you want it to be. I'm 5'8", 145 lbs. and bought a medium. The shoulders fit properly and it's comfortable around the chest with enough room to make it loose but not baggy. If I wanted a slim fit, I could probably have bought a small. This is a pretty blouse and one that will good for any occasion.
Quality fabric and quality sewing. Fits well. Use the size chart that goes with the product!
Didn't like the material thought it was itchy and did not sit well on my body. Color was beautiful though really wished it was better quality
Casual wear-

I like the light blue color and it is light weight, making it ideal for the summer. However, it is a boxy cut making it less flattering if you have a long torso.  I wish I could remove a few stitches in the neckline, it does come up a bit higher than what is shown in the photo.  I'll still wear it and like it. But it probably won't be my "feel good" summer top.
Really cute design with good coverage but it’s 100% polyester which is too hot for me.
Bust I'd tight do must order size up
This is a nice piece for the price however it does run large
Sizing is off

I usually wear my shirts loose - I grew up in the 80s lmao - I bought the purple and white in a large because of the sizing chart. TBH it really does fit well, according to size measurements and is a flattering fit, though for my comfort level it feels tight in the chest (I am a C cup) I'm not used to wearing anything tight and subtly "revealing"... a struggle I'm working on lmao I hope my rant review is helpful lol It is pretty and feminine, I love the lace which is why I bought 2. I would've given 5 stars but for if my comfort level issue is shared out there lol

I like when something arrives and looks as expected. Feminine and light, flattering. Not a tight fit, but also not really loose. I like the sleeve length, also not a tight fit. Can be dressed up or down. It did develop a small separation of the sheer outer layer from the inner layer under one arm. I was able to sew back together. It’s now one of my favorite shirts. I get compliments when I wear it. I ordered a medium and it fits well. 5’6.5”, 165#, 36D bust. Easy care- I wash on gentle cycle and hang dry. I would give it 5 stars if it didn’t develop the separation that needed mending.

I liked this top. It’s lined. I got the burgundy colored one, and you definitely cannot see through it. The shoulders and arms definitely fit like a smaller size than what I ordered. If you carry any extra weight in your arms or have slightly wider shoulders, you’d benefit by sizing up. The only downside is the shirt is slightly low-cut, so if you make it oversized, you might need to wear a camisole or some thing underneath for modesty. I definitely buy it again, but just in a larger size. For reference, I normally wear a large, but should’ve ordered a XL.

I like the top but would agree with other reviews in that the neck line is not a “plunge’ at all would have liked a little more plunger.  And it is rather blousy at the bottom.  I purchased a large and it was a tad snug around the top and large at the bottom.  I am 5’5 and 145 not really big busted.  But that being said it is a cute top and looks great with jeans.
Love the material and texture but a little tight in chest.
Unfortunately it wasn’t the right fit for me. But I love the product and I’m interested in shopping other items from this vendor. Fast shipping and good craftsmanship. 👍

Super pretty, runs on the narrow side.  Zero give so it doesn’t work for me personally.  I gifted it to my mom and she loves it.  It’s more for people that don’t need to move in it.  I move a lot daily.  Definitely handwash/gentle cycle. No dryer.
It’s actually a lot better than I expected. I wasn’t sure because there are some mixed reviews. I think it’s super cute and can be dressed up or down. True to size.

Tucks in sleeve at shoulder are very outdated. Evidently the tucked sleeves are current once again. I re-ordered in a smaller size and the fit is much better. This is really a very pretty blouse and I’m glad I tried it again.
It’s very wide , square
This shirt runs really long and large for the size. The size L was more like a 2X or 3X on me. If you want big and loose then this is a shirt for you.
I love the sleeve on this top; however, I ordered my usual Large and it did not fit. The hip area was too tight so I will be returning.

评论概述: Fits more like a tunic, not a blouse!
评论详情: For reference on the fit, I am 5"5 195 lbs, and usually a 16 in pants and XL in shirts. This blouse is pretty, and is not too low cut, as I feared based on some of the pics. It is sheer, yes,  but I gave it only one star for sheerness bc the lining makes it opaque so I don't feel self-conscious. The sleeves are the sheer part, and it's only semi-sheer. You can just barely see my tattoos through the sleeves. The most important detail for me to share is this fits like a tunic, not a blouse! It is long on me - covers the crotch long - which to me, defines the fit of a tunic. It is flowy, not fitted, and since it is so long would love for the waist to be tapered a bit more. But it's still cute. I would wear this with leggings as opposed to jeans because on my frame it is too long to wear with jeans and not look silly. That being said, I still like this and will be keeping it, despite it not being what I was expecting! I would even consider getting it in another color.

Love the lace that gives a feminine look  Be aware that there is fabric under the first layer and it does not stretch  I ordered my usual Amazon recommended size and I was able to wear it but it was slightly snug on the hips but I was able to move the fabric up and the fit was ok  If I order another one, I will size up

I ordered a large. It was the suggested size and honestly have never returned any clothes. So thought I was safe. I definetly needed a 2xl for this to fit comfortably. It’s a very pretty shirt though and lightweight.
No buttons!

评论概述: Read the reviews, then sized up…and its perfect.
评论详情: I purchased this blouse to act as a staple for an upcoming vacation  It is a great blouse that can be dressed up or down.  I did follow the advice of the reviews.  I range from L to XL usually in shirts depending on the brand.  i ordered the xxl and it fits as expected.
I love it
Very cute shirt just no stretch at all

I have loved this top forever. Bought it last year, had to return because was snug. Lost some weight and, even though I need it for a funeral, I decided to try it again. It fits so beautifully (I am 5'3", 220lb, size 2x). I received it overnight which is very important. It could be dressed up or down. Definitely will be looking for more colors.
The blouse is even better in person than in the picture. I love it!

评论概述: Runs just a little small. If in doubt go one size up.
评论详情: Pretty, covers stomach and butt without adding pounds. I prefer cotton but that's getting hard to find.

I seldom if ever give 5 stars. Omgosh, but this item deserves it!  It got here quickly!  I had bought  recently 2 blouses from others in Amazon and I had to send it back because they were nothing like the pictures or described, so I was scared to buy clothing again. But THIS BLOUSE IT'S EXACTLY HOW IT LOOKS AND DESCRIBED! I think it's even better in person, hehe! I'm extremely happy.  It feels like it's great quality.  Love it, love it, love it!! I will definitely buy from them again. It has gained my trust.
The shirt is really cute but it has no stretch and it is not the best for summer time the fabric is a not soft like you think it would be by the picture.

This is a really cute top but it's much dressier than I thought. The fabric is nice and light and it probably would not be very cool in hot weather since it doesn't look like it's breathable but I really liked it. It was just too dressy for what I was looking for.
Very cute
At first I thought maybe the v was to low. The top was a perfect fit. Thank you.
This shirt was exactly what I was looking for.  The fabric was nice and it fit me well.  It was well made, too.  I was very pleased.
Too small

This top is really cute and fit, but the fabric has no stretch and this made it uncomfortable to move in. I’d probably size up, except the color was different than shown. The picture was a brighter, purplish blue, but what I received was a dark navy. Returning.
Got this shirt nice made but size is way off if you wear large get xxl now it will go to my daughter who is a small

This shirt is pretty. Looks just like ad photo. Texture is nice. BUT I ORDERED A MEDIUM AND IT IS A LARGE! So be prepared when purchasing: this will come large and it’s not the kind of fabric that will shrink to fit.
This shirt fits fabulously!  Wear with jeans or shorts or dress it up.  Can’t go wrong.  I have the shirt in lt blue
Super cute shirt. Wanted to love it but it was sewn poorly. Uneven seems, hem and bunched lining made it unwearable. I returned.
Couldn’t wait to receive but it’s a little boxy, I should have ordered a size smaller. I also did not realize the sleeves were sheer.
Shirt/material is great.  I have a 36H chest and ordered an XL. The shirt looked great but extremely tight when I move my arms so I should’ve order a size up for boob room.
Love the fit, it washes well, it’s comfortable and it’s a good price point

评论概述: The product when received, looks like the picture that you ordered
评论详情: The top did not appear as it did in the picture I was disappointed 😞

I bought this shirt in both white and in black.  I love them.  They don't stretch around the hip area, so make sure you order according to hip size, then bra size.  I wore these in Laughlin, NV at 100 degree heat and I felt cool and comfortable.  I love the "lace" trim.  Not scratchy lace.  Washes well in a washing machine mesh bag on cold and hung to dry.  Dried fast for having a light lining inside.  Didn't shrink and don't need to iron.  Can wear with anything.

评论概述: It’s a pretty shirt..kinda big but love it
评论详情: I’m 5’3” and weigh 115 pounds and this is a small. An extra small probably would’ve been better but I’m happy… the material is really pretty. I’m 67. Will be nice when I get a little tan in the summer😁

评论概述: Fits perfectly and the color is beautiful
评论详情: Absolutely love this top. Incredibly comfortable and looks very professional. Perfect length to front tuck. I am 5’10”. The sleeves fit nicely and are a great length for summer.
Very long, order a size less
I love that this blouse is lined so not to be sheer. Looks really good with any skirt or short, to dress them up. True to size. (XL)
It is a nice quality and looks good. I have washed and hung dry. I would recommend.
Great fit, simple to wear.  My best friend said WHAT A CUTE TOP!
I have only tried it on, seems like the blouse is good quality butayne because of the liner underneath, it does run small by at least one full size

Shirt is an excellent value delicate appearing but lined. Great work shirt. Got compliments first day I wore it. I am petite and large busted so ordered 2x and fit great no button gaps and fit shoulders arms and length well.
Blouse is beautiful and well made. Unfortunately it is banded at the bottom and did not hit well for my body shape.  I regretfully had to return the blouse.
It is super cute, but I have larger hips and it fits snugger on my hips then I would like. It’s not stretchy. I still wear and like it.

4 stars, because this shirt is gorgeous, but the sizing seems very small. So I sadly returned without reorder. I typically wear anywhere from L-2X in tops. Taking into consideration it was suppose to fit loose, I ordered an XL. Nope, not even close to fitting. I'm bummed, as the shirt itself was gorgeous. But I couldn't go up 2 sizes to not only fit, but fit loose...
Cute top and perfect color. Runs small through the bust. Definitely need to go up a size but then risk it being large through the rest of the body.

评论概述: Love this top and would like to have more of them but can't find them on Amazon any more
评论详情: This top is very flattering and would like to have some different colors in them.  Can't find them on Amazon anymore

The white blouse fit well and looks nice. HOWEVER, the one that is listed as "yellow" was a big disappointment!! It is more like a pumpkin or mango colour - definitely NOT yellow. I probably won't wear it. Pity as it fits well. :o(
Top is very cute, can wear for dress or casual. I ordered large which was a little tight so returned it.  Very fresh looking when on, lace trim. Good price for style/quality of top.

Super cute! Not too sheer. Arms and shoulder area fit fine for me, but not a lot of stretch. Not sure how to describe this but when I sit down the center lace strip sort of bubbles out. It’s stiffer material so it doesn’t lay flat against my body. Not going to lie, it does look cuter on the model lol, but it’s still super cute in person and I am happy with it!
Loved the shirt. It was flattering. It could be worn for a day out shopping or for a business casual environment. There is no stretch at all to tbs shirt.
Good material . Dress it up or down . I’m normally a 16 and the ck large was perfect

评论概述: So pretty, but way too big
评论详情: I’m not a tiny person so I normally order up on Amazon. With nicer clothes, I do like it a bit more form fitting so I ordered my normal size (medium) and the shirt is huge:( i think even if I got the small it’ll be too big. I’m so sad because it’s such a pretty blouse!
The sleeves are much shorter than what is advertised. The lining is light weight. The overall fit is nice.
9/10 would recommend! It's cute and comfortable, and I got complimented while wearing it. My only "holdup" is at how fragile the sheer fabric feels. I'm hesitant to even handwash!

评论概述: Was going to return but changed my mind
评论详情: First, I love the scalloped detail around the neck and sleeves. I love the dot texture and the sheerness. Very interesting.  I was going to return because it is larger so I wasn’t sure. It has really good drape, but it was just a little more boxy than I thought. I tried it on with a high waisted skirt- darling. I tried it with skinny jeans untucked- darling. I tried it tucked with the skinny jeans - darling. Then my husband saw it and he loved it. It’s a keeper! I got white which is really sharp.
The shirt was way too long for me.  I ordered the XL which was a great fit but to long and not easily shortened. So returned it.

I love this shirt. It has an underlayer, which prevents it from being too see through. I bought this in white, so I am very happy to have that underlayer. The V-neck is perfect - looks good but doesn't show off too much cleavage. There are not buttons, so no risk of a button accidentally opening up.  You could wear it untucked or tucked in as both would be cute.

I love this shirt, and it is very versatile, I have worn it with skirts and jeans. One thing I did was I took a tuck at the bottom of the sleeve and added a little button. I don’t think it needed that detail but I think it makes it a little bit cuter and it took me about 5 minutes! I like sometimes adding a custom touch. Happy with this purchase!

This top is very cute and flattering. It is nice quality and has a lining. I ordered the size I thought best and not the Amazon recommended size and it fit. I’m not sure how Amazon determines your size, but in my case, they think I need larger sizes and it’s resulted in several returns. So, now I order the size I think will best fit and items are working out better.

Too long adding extra bulk when tucked in which is never flattering for women. Would have been great if stopped at the waist. Used quality made materials. So if you want a more tunic type sweater maybe this is for you but it was not the way it was described

评论概述: Love the Compliments with this Top
评论详情: I love all of the Compliments I get when I wear this top. It is made out of a sheer material, so I wear an undershirt with it. It does not stretch, but it is spot on with sizing. It is a flattering top and the design of the fabric helps to hide a body blimishes. Love, Love this top The V-Neck is not as low as the picture shows which is a plus also.

Cute shirt, runs a little small in the shoulders. It’s really hard to get on and off, I would size up if in between sizes. I usually wear small-medium in tops and bought a small. Should have bought a medium.

Has to get something last minute for a funeral. Took a risk and ordered it. Adorable!! Will be wearing a lot besides today. I only gave it 4 stars b/c it has no stretch at all so make sure you get a big enough size but no worries it still still runs true to size.

Ever since I started wearing this top, I get many compliments per day wearing it. You actually don’t even have to baby this top. I made the mistake of putting it in the dryer and it came out perfect no rips no no random strings. I’m definitely getting more colors for the price drops a little bit.
Fits okay . A little to snug in the breast area. If the shirt had a little give it would be fine . But it has NO give at all .

Not too sheer. Not much stretch to it but I did not have that expectation. The chest area was too big and the waist area was too small. I ordered a XL. I am not sure if it is my shape or the style of the shirt. I am returning it, but I would had kept it if it had fit since it is very pretty and versatile.
I'd give it 5 stars but it fits a little tight. Otherwise, dressy and easy care.

评论概述: Runs big and heavy stitching at the bottom where you would tuck in
评论详情: Runs big and heavy stitching at the bottom where you would tuck in. Color is nice.
Very pleased with this blouse.  Size was correct and very nicely made.

Even though I had to return this due to fit, o loved this shirt. It was light weight without being too sheer. The length was long enough to cover my lower pouch without looking sloppy or like a tunic. I have big arms and wide shoulders so tops are always hard to find. I ordered true to my size (XL) and the shoulder were narrow and the arm holes too snug for me. I may size up and order again .

The shirt fits a little tight at the bottom hem line and plunges a little deeper than I’m comfortable with at the bust but overall not too bad. There is not give to the fabric which makes it little challenging to get on and off. The deep green color is very beautiful!!

This shirt is pretty but the sizing is way off  The sizing chart said I should wear a XL, Well it was HUGE. So I reordered a L, guess what?, again it was too large. The hem on these shirts is terrible. the shirt is very long. Hey but other than that it is a pretty shirt!
Loved this blouse, the material,the quality, just a tad to small thru the shoulders for me. I’m gonna try a large for comparison. Again Absolutely Love the blouse

评论概述: The lace gathers at the bottom of the blouse.
评论详情: The lace gathers at the bottom of the blouse.  It was s stitched incorrect
It is much smaller than other shirts the same size.  Order one size larger

I wanted something a little different from my usual style for my vacation and I picked this lovely blouse. It fits nice in the chest area since there are darts. The neckline is flattering. The blouse is lined, so not sheer at all. Best of all I machine washed and dried with cool water and medium dryer. Pulled it right out of dryer and hung immediately with NO WRINKLES!!!
